channel.title: CVE Feed for BdThemes -- Element Pack Elementor Addons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BdThemes -- Element Pack Elementor Addons

item.title: CVE-2024-47392|2024-10-07T13:17:57.232Z -- bdthemes -- element%20pack%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BdThemes Element Pack Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Element Pack Elementor Addons: from n/a through 5.7.5.
